org.asoem.greyfish.impl.environment

Class DefaultBasicEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.core.environment.AbstractEnvironment<BasicAgent>
      • org.asoem.greyfish.impl.environment.DefaultBasicEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiscreteTimeEnvironment<BasicAgent>, Environment<BasicAgent>, DiscreteEventScheduler, Scheduler, DiscreteTime, BasicEnvironment, SynchronizedAgentsEnvironment<BasicAgent>

    @ThreadSafe
public final class DefaultBasicEnvironment
extends AbstractEnvironment<BasicAgent>
implements BasicEnvironment
    The default thread safe implementation of BasicSimulation.
